rewrite1:

- In the second paragraph, set the Outline Level to 5 and adjust the line spacing to 1.5 lines for easier readability.

- Move to the eighth paragraph and make the following changes: switch the Outline Level to 'Body Text,' introduce a space of 1 centimeter before the paragraph begins, align the text to the right, and alter the Hanging indent to 6 points for a polished appearance.
